content: ★ festive coffee cup sleeve crochet pattern ★ a fun fast christmas make for cosy cups and festive cheer looking for a crochet coffee sleeve pattern that s quick clever and perfect for the holidays these festive coffee cup sleeves bring the charm of the starlight and twinkling trees designs into a small satisfying project made with scraps of dk yarn and using simple overlay mosaic crochet they look beautifully detailed while staying wonderfully beginner-friendly whether you re making a christmas crochet cozy for yourself whipping up stocking fillers or preparing for market season this crochet cup sleeve pattern gives you four festive chart options to play with if you re new to mosaic crochet or already love the technique this quick crochet pattern is a brilliant way to learn experiment and enjoy a modern textured project this mosaic crochet pattern includes a fully written pattern and complete mosaic charts for all 4 cozies so you can follow whichever format suits you best crocheted using us single_crochet and double_crochet stitches designed for most standard reusable coffee cups with easy adjustment tips included *please note*-- this listing is for a pdf pattern written in english not a finished product pattern features to fit a standard 8 mug but easily adjustable skill level adventurous beginner/intermediate stitch single_crochet and double_crochet format instant pdf download + full video tutorial language english us terms with uk stitch conversion chart two printable presentation cards for gifting or market displays why you ll love it one-colour-per-round mosaic crochet easy rhythmic and so satisfying seamless construction with no sewing or joining quick to make ideal stash-buster or last-minute gift beautiful texture and endless colour possibilities includes a step-by-step video tutorial for visual learners detailed instructions 15-page pdf in us crochet terms for clear easy-to-follow guidance materials needed category 3 double knit yarn i used 100% acrylic 260m / 284yds / 100g exact yarn detailed in pattern yarn a each size needs 1 ball of yarn approx 60 yds yarn b each size needs 1 ball of yarn approx 40 yds crochet hook 4mm g for the rib and 4 5mm g+ for the main body or the size that meets the gauge for the pattern yarn needle scissors stitch markers pattern includes detailed instructions over 15 page ebook stitch guide sizing chart/schematic step by step stitch tutorial colour inspiration page full video tutorial customisation guide instant download start crocheting your own mosaic coffee cup sleeve
